tool_description: Analyzes the kitchen work triangle between sink, stove, and refrigerator to optimize workflow efficiency.

sink_x.description: Sink X coordinate in inches from room origin

sink_y.description: Sink Y coordinate in inches from room origin

stove_x.description: Stove X coordinate in inches from room origin

stove_y.description: Stove Y coordinate in inches from room origin

refrigerator_x.description: Refrigerator X coordinate in inches from room origin

refrigerator_y.description: Refrigerator Y coordinate in inches from room origin

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: All coordinates must be positive numbers.
Triangle too large: Work triangle perimeter exceeds 26 feet maximum for efficiency.
Triangle too small: Work triangle perimeter below 10 feet minimum for functionality.
Appliances too close: Minimum 4 feet clearance required between appliances.
usage: Input X,Y coordinates of sink, stove, and refrigerator to calculate work triangle efficiency and identify optimization opportunities.

triangle_perimeter.description: Total work triangle distance in feet
